articles.content: The International Judo Federation (IJF) announced on Sunday that Russian President Vladimir Putin and businessman Arkady Rotenberg have been removed from all their positions. On February 27, Mr Putin… [+2052 chars]

articles.author: S Sudarshanan
articles.title: 'Wanted to hide under the covers until the sun came out'; it did, and Suzie Bates ended her 14-year glitch - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: After the Bangladesh innings, "I made sure I got off the field quickly and reset and do the routines I have been doing"
